summary: Provides a comprehensive implementation of the DCOM runtime over DCE/RPC, including activation blobs, object reference handling, interface management, version configuration, custom headers, and session error handling, enabling remote creation and manipulation of COM objects across the network.
business_intent: Facilitates remote COM object activation and interaction for security testing, forensic analysis, and network diagnostics by abstracting the lowâ€‘level DCE/RPC mechanisms required to marshal, unmarshal, and invoke COM interfaces on remote Windows hosts.
